structure.unit: ARTICLE CXIX. BUILDING BETTER COMMUNITIES CITIZENS' ADVISORY COMMITTEE

text.section:
Sec. 2-1805. Staff and Counsel.
The County Manager and the County Attorney shall provide such staff support to the Advisory Committee as may be necessary to accomplish its purpose. The Advisory Committee shall be provided meeting facilities and pre-approved expense reimbursement as the Commission or the County Manager may deem necessary to accomplish the Committee's purposes.
